title: The Cervelo Aspero Refines Its Performance Gravel Proposition
content:
The Cervelo Aspero has always been self-assured. As a gravel bike, it doesn’t try to be all things to everyone. Rather, it’s focused on allowing a rider to go as fast as they can pedal.
